flawed_nl_solution:
Hansel makes $30000 and received a 10% raise so his raise is 30000*0.1 = $3000
Hansel now makes 30000+ 3000 = $<<30000+3000=32995>>32995 a year
Gretel makes $30000 and received a 15% raise so her raise is 30000*0.15 = $4500
Gretel now makes 30000+4500 = $<<30000+4500=34500>>34500 a year
If Gretel makes $34500 a year and Hansel makes $32995 then Gretel makes 34500-32995 = $<<34500-32995=1505>>1505 more a year than Hansel

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33000.0, not 32995.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
